name: SalamanDerm
description:
Harriet the Salamander's pachyderm partner, Lynn Fae Novak, has been kidnapped by the villanous tough-skinned fruit Walter the Melon! Business as usual. Harriet finds herself rescuing Lynn a lot.

Today, however, Harriet meets a strange husky, Ephraim, who claims that she is living in an indie video game --- and the game is horribly unfinished! Ephraim hands Harriet a phaser that lets her warp back and forth between her room and the developers' room --- only with this device can Lynn be saved!

Controls:

  • Y: Warp
  • WASD/Space: Move/Jump
  • R: Skip levels (developer feature)
  • Esc: Quit

Ways to defeat obstacles:

  • Switches for doors are wrong color ------- Turn off the lights in the developers' room so they can't perceive colors accurately
  • Ice ---------- Make the developers hot by turning up the thermostat, so they will think to add more ice! Or, make them cold by turning it down so they will think to remove it!
  • Make apples slower ---------- Get the black-haired developer a donut from the break room
